title: Hey if anyone know me plz come
body: My account got a banned if you used to be my friend plz come here and give me your user name

replies.body:
Hey Summoner,

This board is mostly for getting help with technical issues. It's also not shown on the Boards Home page, so not many will see this. I suggest posting this over in [**Miscellaneous**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous). If you're trying to access your friends list to re-add them on another account, you might try submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) under that account.

-DTN
